Prepare Final Merged Dataset with Metadata

prepare_final_data.Rd

Merges observation data with metadata sheets ("placette" and "modalite") if available. The function first joins the plot-level and treatment-level metadata, then links the result to the combined observation data using the plot_id column.

Utilisation

prepare_final_data(self)

Arguments

self

An instance of the UserData R6 class containing observation data and metadata.

Valeur de retour

A data.frame with observation data enriched by plot and treatment metadata. If no observation data is available, returns only the merged plot + modality metadata. If required metadata is missing, returns NULL with a message.

Détails

  • Assumes that self$metadata$plot_desc contains factor_level_code and plot_id.

  • Assumes that self$metadata$moda_desc contains xp_trt_code.

  • If self$combined_data is not set, calls to combine_data_obs() are made automatically.
